## Step 0: Sent no transactions

- Balance = 500
- 1 transaction so far 
- Transaction 1: (First wallet sent 500 coins to the mobile wallet)

```json
{
    "data":{
        "publicKey":"",
        "previous":[
            {
                "previousID":0,
                "previousIdx":0
            }
        ],
        "fee":1,
        "recipients":[
            {
                "index":0,
                "address":"",
                "amount":500
            }
        ],
        "type":"normal",
        "timestamp":1585778290947
    },
    "id":"b303a60d2faf595f35c8953ec17098b5303358225c8732c1efe896dceadb64a9",
    "signature":""
}
```





## Step 1: After sending the first transaction (5 coins to wallet1)

- Balance: 494
- 2 total transactions (1 new)
- Transaction 2: (Sending 5 coins from mobile wallet to wallet1) 
```json
{
    "data":{
        "publicKey":"",
        "previous":[
            {
                "previousID":"b303a60d2faf595f35c8953ec17098b5303358225c8732c1efe896dceadb64a9",
                "previousIdx":0
            }
        ],
        "fee":1,
        "recipients":[
            {
                "index":0,
                "address":"",
                "amount":5
            }
        ],
        "type":"normal",
        "timestamp":1585781713562
    },
    "id":"2f3fffec06370154334c0b218c59d426b727f550c63799ca4067490444c5395b",
    "signature":""
}
```


## Step 2: After sending 5 coins to wallet 2 and 5 to wallet 3

- Balance: 483
- 3 total transactions (1 new)
- Transaction 3: (Sent 5 coins to wallet 2 and 5 coins to wallet 3 from mobile wallet)
```json
{
    "data":{
        "publicKey":"",
        "previous":[
            {
                "previousID":"b303a60d2faf595f35c8953ec17098b5303358225c8732c1efe896dceadb64a9",
                "previousIdx":0
            }
        ],
        "fee":1,
        "recipients":[
            {
                "index":0,
                "address":"",
                "amount":5
            },
            {
                "index":0,
                "address":"",
                "amount":5
            }
        ],
        "type":"normal",
        "timestamp":1585781713575
    },
    "id":"6da06e218cca437c0f24df241bbbcd09663a141d94b20a55f83a1037e309c9ff",
    "signature":""
}
```
